summary: The class is demonstrating a strong performance overall, with a notable emphasis on assignment completion. A strong group of students are excelling; however, a few students need additional support.

attentionNeeded.name: Noah Patel
attentionNeeded.reason: Shows a declining trend in academic performance

attentionNeeded.name: Oliver Smith

nextSteps: Build stronger reading comprehension routines to support overall class performance
Increase student confidence in class discussions, especially for those needing attention
Use 5-minute exit tickets to reinforce key concepts and enhance memory
Encourage peer tutoring pairs once per week to stimulate collaborative learning
